name: I Just Wanna Land!
description:
A "platformer" without platforms made for the 2018 GMTK Jam.

Instead of jumping from platform to platform, you flap your wings to effectively jump in the air.  You can also choose which direction you propel yourself in by aiming.

Keyboard Controls:

- Z/X: Flap

- Left + Right Arrows: Aim

- Enter: Pause Game

Gamepad Controls:

- Face Buttons: Flap

- Tilt Left Stick Left + Right: Aim

- Start: Pause Game

To toggle fullscreen mode, hit Alt+Enter.

You can also play it here: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=31800
